query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS live_stream_donations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  stream_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  creator_share DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  platform_share DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT,
  payment_status ENUM('pending', 'completed', 'failed', 'refunded') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  stripe_payment_intent_id VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  INDEX idx_live_stream_donations_stream_id (stream_id),
  INDEX idx_live_stream_donations_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_live_stream_donations_payment_status (payment_status),
  FOREIGN KEY (stream_id) REFERENCES live_streams(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3GtrSVWktBvDbNd.730b1d7910c0 --database 3Ss8KhjHmMbtxkDLhxH8t9 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS live_stream_donations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  stream_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  creator_share DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  platform_share DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT,
  payment_status ENUM('pending', 'completed', 'failed', 'refunded') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  stripe_payment_intent_id VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  INDEX idx_live_stream_donations_stream_id (stream_id),
  INDEX idx_live_stream_donations_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_live_stream_donations_payment_status (payment_status),
  FOREIGN KEY (stream_id) REFERENCES live_streams(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
